page.title: 13HOSPITALS IN BRIDGEND
page.content: There are 5 hospitals in the area. {Glanrhyd}was built in 1857 and {Parc-Gwyllt}in 1890,both are mental hospitals.{Penyfai}mental hospital was built in 1936.{Bridgend General {Hospital}was built in 1836.It opened as a workhouse for poor,homeless people and an infirmary was opened in 1900.A{new Hospital,The Princess of {Wales,}opened 4.10.85. The 2 hospitals built on Cefn-Hirgoed Common in 1906 were isolation hospitals.Cefn-Hirgoed hospital caters for old or handicapped patients but is in the process of closing down. Heddfan was demolished in 1980 to make way for the M4 Motorway.
